description:
Hello all!

It's been a while since we organized the last Porto Big Data meetup, and it's time to restart the data engagement.

As such we are holding another meetup, and will have great speakers from Google and Dataiku.

Talk 1: From Zero to Machine Learning on Google Cloud
Tiago Sá (https://www.linkedin.com/in/tiagosa/)
Customer Engineer at Google Cloud Portugal

----------

Talk 2: Customer Segmentation, Churn Detection: How to leverage Advanced Analytics for Increased Customer Knowledge
Lynn Rachwan (https://www.linkedin.com/in/lynn-rachwan-dataiku)
Business Developer at Dataiku

We are also gonna have some pizzas for the networking session.

Hoping to see you there,
Rui Ramos
name: Porto Big Data - 3rd Meetup
